data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=hDINE9StXJgQ7kNvgF2_T21&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAoCkFLJ1Vng_CGa1n3o1h45gto9FFG7HGa26xrIUyd-A&oe=66A629B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1qtFsXD-gv4Q7kNvgEAa6WM&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBQl7B-5KfnqaVsRm-KTATnNdmZNHw7Xzri85yg4Tre5w&oe=66A63752)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=suS3JG9YtncQ7kNvgH1OQmN&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCqbPP9ZlH78VDOquDdHwRpS2MkOFIzVSADgI4CU4tRuQ&oe=66A62289)
